name: Taj Mahal, Agra
description: A timeless symbol of love, this UNESCO World Heritage Site captivates with its stunning architecture.

name: Kerala Backwaters
description: Cruise through serene waters on houseboats, surrounded by lush greenery and tranquil villages.

name: Royal Rajasthan
description: Explore majestic forts, vibrant markets, and desert landscapes in the Land of Kings.

name: Himalayan Adventure
description: Trek through breathtaking mountains and discover spiritual serenity in the Himalayas.

name: Goa Beaches
description: Unwind on golden sands, enjoy water sports, and soak in Goa's vibrant coastal vibe.

name: Sacred Varanasi
description: Witness ancient rituals and spiritual serenity along the sacred Ganges River.

name: Jim Corbett National Park
description: Experience thrilling wildlife safaris and spot the majestic Royal Bengal Tiger.

name: Golden Triangle
description: Explore Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur - India's most iconic cultural circuit.

name: Ladakh Adventure
description: Experience high-altitude desert landscapes and Buddhist monasteries in the Himalayas.

name: Mysore Palace
description: Marvel at the opulent Indo-Saracenic architecture of this magnificent royal palace.

name: Andaman Islands
description: Discover pristine beaches, coral reefs, and crystal-clear waters in these tropical islands.
